document.full_text: a man shot and killed by the u.s. border patrol in southern arizona last week was attempting to scale the border fence and cross into mexico, a sheriff's department spokeswoman said on monday.
document.title: patrol shot man as he scaled fence to mexico: sheriff's office
lines_and_colors: a man shot and killed by the u.s. border patrol in southern arizona last week was attempting to scale the border fence and cross into mexico, a sheriff's department spokeswoman said on monday.
